Class MP3_File

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.File
        |
        +--MP3_File
public class MP3_File
extends java.io.File

Keeps track of information about an MP3 audio file.

Version:
3.0 - December 1999
Author:
C. Vickery
See Also:

Constructor Detail

MP3_File

public MP3_File(java.lang.String file)
         throws Invalid_MPEG_FileException
Creates an MP3_File object from a file name. The file must exist, must have a name ending in .mp3, and must contain at least one valid MP3 Audio Frame.
Parameters:
file - The pathname of the mp3 file on disk.
Throws:
Invalid_MPEG_FileException - if the file name is invalid or if the file does not contain any valid MP3 Audio Frames.

MP3_File

public MP3_File(java.io.File dir,
                java.lang.String name)
         throws Invalid_MPEG_FileException
Creates an MP3_File object from a directory and file name.
Parameters:
dir - The directory containing the file.
name - The name of the file.
Throws:
Invalid_MPEG_FileException - if dir or name is invalid or if the file does not contain any valid MP3 Audio Frames.

MP3_File

public MP3_File(java.io.File file)
         throws Invalid_MPEG_FileException
Creates an MP3_File object from a File object.
Parameters:
file - The File.
Throws:
Invalid_MPEG_FileException - if file is invalid or if the file does not contain any valid MP3 Audio Frames.
